title: Landing Pages Management
subtitle: Manage landing page analytics, leads, and CTA settings

mode.label: Landing Page Mode
mode.description: Pre-Launch mode shows waitlist buttons. Live mode directs to registration.

ctaText.label: CTA Button Text
ctaText.description: The text displayed on the main call-to-action button.

ctaLink.label: CTA Button Link
ctaLink.description: Where the button should link to. Use # for scroll to form, or /auth/register for live mode.

published.label: Published
published.description: When published, the landing page is visible to the public.
